entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Val Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:53 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 6 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 6 except minus 1 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 March 2023
